subject: Ryder Cup (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Tiger Woods, who is making his seventh Ryder Cup appearance this week at Medinah Country Club, has been on one victorious team in the biennial event, in 1999.
snippet: Tiger Woods, who is making his seventh Ryder Cup appearance this week at Medinah Country Club, has been on one victorious team in the biennial event, in 1999.
